briefdescription.para: fixes the hotspots of all subtextures to (x,y).

detaileddescription.para: this is a temporary workaround; such fixes should actually be done in the convert script.

briefdescription.para: activates the influence of a given alpha mask to this texture.

returns the opengl texture id of this texture.
The texture loadin must occur on the thread that manages the gl context.

memberdef.name: make_gl_texture

detaileddescription.para: You may believe it or not, but this class represents a single texture, which can be drawn on the screen.
The class supports subtextures, so that one big texture can contain several small images. These are the ones actually to be rendered.
